data.title: Jason Lee on LinkedIn: N1 Health
data.meta_description:
Get a New Start in 2024. Join me and a growing team on the cutting edge of healthcare here at N1 Health.
https://lnkd.in/gF8dB3J3

üåü Empower Healthcare with QHSLab: Elevate Clinical Decisions and Patient Care üåü Leveraging digital medicine is crucial in today‚Äôs healthcare landscape. At QHSLab, Inc., we lead with innovative solutions that extend healthcare providers' capabilities to enhance patient interactions and uncover vital health insights beyond initial assessments. Featuring our leading-edge PHQ-GAD16 Assessment, we offer evidence-based screenings in both English and Spanish to reveal critical health conditions, focusing on mental health, chronic pain, and more. Our Integrated Service Program includes: -Customized Practice Integration- -Remote Patient Engagement- -Efficient Administrative Services- -Comprehensive Billing and Quality Assurance Support- -Strategies for Enhanced Patient Care and Revenue Growth- Embrace the future with QHSLab, where technology enhances clinical precision and patient care, leading to improved outcomes and increased revenue. üì≤ Let‚Äôs make a difference together. For collaboration or to learn more about how QHSLab can transform your practice, contact me directly. https://www.qhslab.com/ #DigitalHealth #PatientCare #ClinicalDecisions #HealthcareInnovation

In a world where every company wants to push customers to a website or IVR system for support, I love that we are doing to opposite. Instead of using technology to drive customers away from the human connection, Quantum is using technology to expand and deepen the human connection with customers. A person‚Äôs healthcare journey is incredibly personal, so the compassion, empathy, and individuality of the human connection is essential. #healthcarenavigation #employeebenefits

GenAI is seems buzzy right now, but truly is a powerful tool when used in the right context. Quantum Health continues to incorporate advanced technologies and innovation to move the needle on reducing the burden for the member and client. Listen in as our president Shannon Skaggs shares our insights. #AI #GenAI #healthcareinnovation #navigation

Curious to learn about what I am a part of now? Watch our 30 minute on-demand webinar to see a sneak peek of the healthcare revolution! WellSky CarePort solutions have led the way in care transitions, and now we invite you to be a part of seeing what's next! Our solution leaders will provide an exclusive look into the innovations that will spearhead a healthcare revolution. üó® Dive into the world of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and learn how we're incorporating advanced AI into our solutions to help guide your decision-making processes like never before. üìà Experience the future of data analytics with a fresh, intuitive interface that transforms raw data into actionable insights seamlessly. üîó Explore the evolution of next-generation smart referrals that will streamline and enhance the way you connect and collaborate. üëÄ Witness the introduction of a revamped single platform for post-acute providers to receive any and all referrals - from WellSky and beyond. ‚è∞ Don't miss your chance to witness the healthcare industry's next big leap. https://lnkd.in/e4yrtDnz

We have a few more spots left for health system leaders at Elion's private genAI adoption round table. (sign up here: https://lu.ma/ElionGenAI) You'll join executives from across the country's academic medical centers, regional mid-sized health systems, and small safety net hospitals who are all thinking through leveraging genAI for business operations and provider / patient impact. We'll be discussing how health systems are defining initial use cases for pilots, generating implementation and security best practices, and creating frameworks for evaluating ROI + more. Register below: https://lu.ma/ElionGenAI

Answers Media Network posed the question, are we closer to true, secure, and national interoperability? Here is what the experts had to say, including our CEO David Lareau. ‚ÄúInteroperability will unleash oceans of data, but volume alone holds little value. The breakthrough will come when clinicians can instantly access customized views compiling the most essential information for each patient condition. Solutions that contextually filter, organize, and connect the dots within rising data volume to match clinical workflows will prove the difference-makers in tangible point-of-care impact.‚Äù Check out what they had to say and let us know your thoughts in the comments: https://bit.ly/3vq8KrB | #Interoperability #HealthData #DiagnosticallyConnectedData #ClinicalWorkflows #PointOfCare

Delighted to spotlight a visionary leader, Robert Pearl, M.D., whose strategic acumen and innovative thinking redefined healthcare at Kaiser Permanente Leading the nation's largest medical group for nearly two decades, Dr. Pearl steered the organization through significant challenges, transforming it into a model of excellence that prioritizes both innovation and high-quality care. In his groundbreaking book, "ChatGPT, MD," Dr. Pearl explores the pivotal role of artificial intelligence in modernizing healthcare systems. His insights shed light on how AI can streamline operations, enhance patient care, and create more equitable health outcomes. Join us as Dr. Pearl, a clinical professor at Stanford and a thought leader in medical innovation, shares his vision for a technology-driven healthcare future. His approach to integrating AI with healthcare practices offers invaluable lessons for all of us in the medical field. üîóSpotify https://lnkd.in/gfWA-Ysv üîó Apple https://lnkd.in/gXZDNFh4 üì¢ Engage with Us: We invite you to listen, learn, and share your thoughts on how AI can further transform healthcare. How do you see AI impacting your practice or area of expertise? Comment below or share this post to keep the conversation going! #LeadershipInHealthcare #healthcare #medicine #medicaldevices #digitalhealth #medtech #healthcareinnovation #Leadership #WellnessattheSpeedofLight
